[NPCHandler.java:3082: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(’:'int NPCID) { this is wat it should look life for all of them ok

item.title: Npc say owner name
item.dc:creator: @I_C_E I C E
item.description:
@I_C_E wrote:

I am trying to make a npc say the owners name if he is online or offline…
When I compile I just get this error:

[NPCHandler.java:3082: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3082: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3082: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3096: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3096: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3096: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3108: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 7 errors Finished!

my NPCHandler.java code is:

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 31) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("testchar123")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner testchar123 is online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The owner testchar123 is offline"; }
and the code is placed after

					npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();

my autspawn.cfg code is:

spawn = 31 3090 3494 0 0 0 0 0 1 Priest

Please help me, IDK if I can REP+ but if I can I will

Read full topic
